name: Grand Tanks: WW2 Tank Games
description:
Grand Tanks is a really interesting and exciting game dedicated to tank battles of the Second World War!
All players are given the opportunity to immerse themselves in the atmosphere of large-scale tank battles, fight with other players online and win battles in PvP battles mode!.
The most pleasant element of the game is a real immersion in the atmosphere of the time of the Second World War.

Grand Tanks was created based on real samples of combat vehicles of the Second World War, where each tank has its own unique characteristics and capabilities.
Players can choose from over 25+ tanks from different countries and eras of military history, from light reconnaissance vehicles to powerful heavy tanks.
"Online" and "Multiplayer" modes are also available, where players can fight with other players from around the world in exciting tank battles.
Choose different types of ammunition, including armor-piercing, cumulative, fragmentation and others to overcome the enemy's armor.
Various improvements for tanks are also available, such as upgrading weapons, engine, armor, etc.
The graphics and sound in the Grand Tanks game also deserve special attention. All tanks and locations are detailed and executed with great attention to detail.
The battles are accompanied by spectacular explosions and the sounds of gunshots, which creates a realistic atmosphere of battle.

Overall, Grand Tanks is an exciting and realistic tank game that offers many opportunities for fans of military equipment and the history of World War II.
It combines high graphics, addictive gameplay and a wide selection of tanks and game modes, which makes it one of the best games in the genre of tank simulators!
Have a nice game!
